thread.title: SafeCharge highlights payment solutions at EiG, Berlin
thread.title_full: SafeCharge highlights payment solutions at EiG, Berlin

author: Retail Technology Review
title: SafeCharge highlights payment solutions at EiG, Berlin
text:
Send to friend 
SafeCharge, the advanced payment technologies solutions provider, is currently sponsoring and attending EiG (Excellence in iGaming), Berlin, 20th to 22nd October 2015, showcasing its Cashier and Fraud solutions. 
The SafeCharge Cashier, a turnkey deposit and withdrawal management solution, has been designed for gaming merchants to give their players a personalised deposit experience. Some key features of the solution are: Localisation capabilities based on geo-location. Play Global â€“ Pay Local Faster and more secure withdrawal methods Payment page auto-adjusted to specific language, currency and regional payment methods Access to multiple payment and currency options with a single integration Best conversion and retention rates with fewer "walkaways" Integrated fraud prevention platform to minimise risk 
This year SafeCharge is sponsoring the Official EiG party for an evening of networking and entertainment. The party is open to EiG delegates, exhibitors, speakers and sponsors.
